Text: well, unfortunately the only one that worked correctly was "When i get bigger" - the rest either didnt have pictures, werent sized correctly on my tablet, or you couldnt tap on the pictures or do the tap on words to read - i have the toshiba thrive - idk wat the deal is - strange how the one worked perfect but the rest didnt - any ideas ?

@remotehugger2

The one that worked in your tablet is  newer version that support resolutions 720p.The others will work correctly in mobile phones with hvga,qvga,wvga screen resolution.We working on the latest versions to crack them.
Thank you - i thought it had something to do with my tablet - the same thing happened with a Dr. Suess collection of books as well - i will look out for the next release - :)
